trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SEQ_00<tab>Krile is ready to hear more from Miayli─or is she?

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SEQ_01<tab>You speak with Krile, who is in the process of steeling herself to receive the answers she has for so long sought. Her resolve hardened, she tells your group that the time to speak with Miayli is come.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SEQ_02<tab>Joined by Lumull and Eyaney, Miayli reveals that her entire family line is descended from the Milalla Speakers of eld─a line that includes Krile, whose mother Alayla was none other than Miayli's beloved sister. It was Alayla's role as Speaker that motivated her both to unlock the key's mysteries and to keep it from falling into the wrong hands, and as her successor, Miayli now feels it her duty to ensure that the relic is safe with you. Thankfully, she is satisfied with your conduct and more than willing to give her blessing that you keep it in your possession. Since Alayla took the historical documents pertaining to the key with her when she joined Preservation, the mayor can provide no further information concerning it─but she can provide Krile with assurances that neither her parents nor her living family would bear her ill will for calling the Source home.
As your comrades make for Overture Plaza, where Miayli has promised you fanfare to accompany your departure, she calls you back for one final word of warning. It is her belief that the key is guided to the hands of its bearers by a mysterious force not unlike fate itself...and if that force has taken an interest in you, you should expect danger to follow.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SEQ_03<tab>Miayli and her people see you off with an abundance of warmth, while Krile vows to return to visit her relatives and treat the levin-afflicted. All too soon, you are back on the road to Alexandria, but the grateful smiles of Treno's people are sure to remain with you a long time yet.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SEQ_04<tab>Back in Living Memory, and with greater certainty than ever that the key's secrets are to be found within Preservation's trove, your comrades make plans to check in with Shale once more. First, however, you must escort Sphene back so she may resume her queenly duties.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SEQ_05<tab>Though Gossan has a few stern words for Sphene regarding her unannounced absence, she manages to smooth it over with talk of reestablishing relations with Treno. Stressing that you should not hesitate to seek her out should the need arise, she and her aide depart─to be replaced moments later by Shale who, as it transpires, was on her way to the containment complex to review the partially decrypted data in its full context. Y'shtola immediately volunteers to join her, and they head off, promising to inform you the very moment they have conclusions to share. Krile, too, will be occupied for a time with her porxie project, so you find yourself free until you are inevitably called upon once more.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Miayli.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_TODO_01<tab>Wait at the destination.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Gossan in Resolution.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Exhaustion aside, Krile sustained no injuries you need worry over.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_002<tab>After that battle, I think we all required a moment. You had better get some rest too─I mean it.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_003<tab>To think Miayli knew Krile's mother... I too am eager to hear the details.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_011<tab>Curious, isn't it? I <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> to know. More than anything. Yet part of me is still terrified...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_012<tab>But having come so far, I can't turn from the truth now.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_013<tab>If everyone is feeling up to it, let us go and have our answers.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>While the key is to be the main topic of our conversation, there is no telling what else Miayli might reveal...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_022<tab>It's alright. I'm ready to hear it.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_023<tab>I find myself feeling anxious on Krile's behalf...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_024<tab>I had every confidence Lumull would be safe in your company, but it heartens me to see him unharmed nonetheless.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_LUMULL_000_025<tab>Ah, our new friends! Do you know why Grandmother called us here? Both Eyaney and I neglected to ask...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_EYANEY_000_026<tab>How are you faring? I hope you've recovered from your brush with the Doomtrain─and did I hear something about a behemoth...?
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_031<tab>If the Milalla's records were in Preservation's possession, I doubt they ever relinquished them. That knowledge must await us back in Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_032<tab>I can't believe I have living relatives here...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_033<tab>...And that they make it seem so simple. Maybe it is enough to just be...Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_034<tab>Lumull and Eyaney have gone to summon the other Milalla we've met from across the city.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_035<tab>Krile looks like she's just seen the first ray of sunlight on a cloudy day. I'm glad she found that which she sought.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_041<tab>Once we are back in Solution Nine, I should like to relax with a hot cup of tea.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_042<tab>Though we're still in the Ninth, it hardly feels like it up here. What a wonder.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_043<tab>If safe and reliable airship travel to Treno were possible, it would cut down on the length and danger of the journey...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_041<tab>It still feels a bit like I'm dreaming... But even should I wake, I'll remember it. I'll <var 1A 02 /var>remember them<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_042<tab>...On a practical note, I am more certain than ever that Shale's work will yield vital insights into the key. I look forward to speaking with her when we arrive in Solution Nine.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_0431<tab>If you don't mind, might we first make our way to Resolution? Gossan will be wondering about my absence...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_044<tab>Heavens, yes. I apologize for keeping you from your duties for so long!
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_045<tab>Think nothing of it. I was more than happy to be a part of your adventure. And Gossan will forgive me once I tell him of Treno...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_051<tab>Though we learned little about the Ascians, our sojourn was more than worthwhile.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_052<tab>We're back!
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_053<tab>According to the people of Treno, there are yet other settlements in the Ninth. We shall have to seek them out one day.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_054<tab>Gossan hasn't worn his regulator since his memory was restored. The experience must have affected him deeply.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GOSSAN_000_061<tab>Ah. This explains much.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GOSSAN_000_062<tab>I wondered why I had seen neither hide nor hair of Your Majesty these past days... May I ask where you have been?
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_063<tab>Er... It's quite a long story...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GOSSAN_000_064<tab>However stalwart your companions, traversing the Mist Continent with no knowledge of what awaited was extraordinarily reckless!
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_065<tab>Th-That I cannot deny, but it availed us much. We have the opportunity to resume diplomatic relations with a longtime ally.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_066<tab>And as I did not, in fact, come to harm...all is well that ends well?
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GOSSAN_000_067<tab>Should you feel compelled to go on any other excursions in future, I expect that you will notify me <var 1A 02 /var>beforehand.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_068<tab>Yes, of course... It was remiss of me. I apologize.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_069<tab>Duty's call is most insistent. Nevertheless, whenever you require my aid, please do not hesitate to seek it.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SHALE_000_070<tab>You're back. How'd it go? Did you find a way down?
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SHALE_000_071<tab>Treno... I've heard the name. Incredible that it's sheltered the Milalla all this time.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_072<tab>What's more, the mayor was able to share the story of the key from her perspective. She believes that the historical documents pertaining to it are stored in Preservation's archives.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SHALE_000_073<tab>They could be. Though our work isn't done yet, we've made progress on the decryption. I was on my way to the containment complex to review the data in situ.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_YSHTOLA_000_074<tab>In that case, allow me to accompany you. Though it may be incomplete, I should like to review the information available.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_SHALE_000_075<tab>We'll contact you as soon as we've made some sense of it.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_076<tab>In the meantime, might I suggest that our Warrior of Light get a good night's sleep or two? You never know what manner of hellish technology will be after us next.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_GRAHATIA_000_077<tab>And Krile, I assume you'll be wanting to familiarize yourself with the care and feeding of porxies.

TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_078<tab>Indeed. While I'm aware of the principles, I was needed elsewhere when the others were treating the levin-afflicted. I shall have to ask Y'shtola to instruct me.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_079<tab>'Tis the least I can do for my family...
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_080<tab>I intend to visit them whenever possible. But my home will always be here in the Source.
TEXT_KINGMJ109_05434_KRILE_000_081<tab>There's nowhere I'd rather be!
